# Preparing files

``` {r, results ='hide'}  
library(BAT)

```


## Calling results dataset

```{r}
Results2 <- read.csv2(here("results","RESULTS.CSV"), header=TRUE, row.names = 1,  stringsAsFactors = T,sep = ",", dec = ".")
str(Results2)
```

## Checking for colinearity 

```{r}

results.variables <- Results2[,1:6]

cor(results.variables, use = "pairwise.complete.obs")
```

## Calculating everything together

```{r}
dep_vars <- Results2[,7:9] 
ind_vars <- Results2[,1:6] 

# create all combinations of ind_vars
ind_vars_comb <- 
  unlist( sapply( seq_len(length(ind_vars)), 
          function(i) {
               apply( combn(ind_vars,i), 2, function(x) paste(x, collapse = "+"))
          }))

# pair with dep_vars:
var_comb <- expand.grid(dep_vars, ind_vars_comb ) 

# formulas for all combinations
formula_vec <- sprintf("%s ~ %s", var_comb$TAlphaAll, var_comb$TalphaNat, var_comb$TAlphaNInd)

# create models
glm_res <- lapply( formula_vec, function(f)   {
    fit1 <- glm( f, data = Results2, family = poisson(logit))
    fit1$coefficients <- coef( summary(fit1))
    return(fit1)
})
names(glm_res) <- formula_vec

# get model for specific formula
glm_res[["DepVar1 ~ IndVar1"]] 

# coefficients for var1 ~ var1
coef(glm_res[["DepVar1 ~ IndVar1"]])

# p-values for var1 ~ var2
coef(glm_res[["DepVar1 ~ IndVar2"]])[,"Pr(>|z|)"]

# p-values in a data.frame
p_values <- 
  cbind(formula_vec, as.data.frame ( do.call(rbind,
        lapply(glm_res, function(x) {
          coefs <- coef(x)
          rbind(c(coefs[,4] , rep(NA, length(ind_vars) - length(coefs[,4]) + 1)))
        })
  )))
```

# GLMM Alphas

## Taxonomical - All Species

### A distancia ao edge, tratamento e a distancia do site ao inicio do trilho explicam a abundancia de todas as especies?
```{r, warning=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
glmm_TAlphaAll_AB<-glmer(TAlphaAll ~ Dist_edge + Treatment + Dist_trail_beginning + (1 | ForestID), data = Results2 , family = poisson)
summary(glmm_TAlphaAll_AB)
```
### A distancia ao edge e a distancia do site ao inicio do trilho explicam a abundancia de todas as especies?
```{r, warning=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
glmm_TAlphaAll_AB<-glmer(TAlphaAll ~ Dist_edge + Dist_trail_beginning + (1 | ForestID), data = Results2 , family = poisson)
summary(glmm_TAlphaAll_AB)
```

### A distancia ao edge explica a abundancia de todas as especies?
```{r, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
glmmT_AlphaAll_A<-glmer(TAlphaAll ~ Dist_edge + (1 | ForestID), data = Results2, family = poisson)
summary(glmmT_AlphaAll_A)
```

### A distancia do site ao inicio do trilho explica a abundancia de todas as especies?
```{r, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
glmm_TAlphaAll_B<-glmer(TAlphaAll ~  Dist_trail_beginning + (1 | ForestID), data = Results2 , family = poisson)
summary(glmm_TAlphaAll_B)
```

### Os tratamentos explicam a abundancia de todas as especies?
```{r, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
glmm_TAlphaAll_C<-glmer(TAlphaAll ~  Treatment + Dist_edge + (1 | ForestID), data = Results2 , family = poisson)
summary(glmm_TAlphaAll_C)
```
